General.Name: Sinostone Guangdong Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinostone(Guangdong) Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells surfacing materials in the United States. It provides quartz, sintered stones, artificial marbles, and natural stones products. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Foshan, China.

1.Name: Jingjing  Jiang
1.Title: Board Sec., Director and Financial Controller
